StateDetails.src

Class StateRecords

  • java.lang.Object
    • StateDetails.src.StateRecords

  • public class StateRecords
extends java.lang.Object
    Database class to which a State can be added or retrieved from

    • Method Detail

      • addRecord

        public java.lang.String addRecord(java.lang.String name,
                                  java.lang.String shortName,
                                  java.lang.String headq,
                                  java.lang.String language)
        This adds a new State to the existing database
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the State
        shortName - Short-notation/Abbreviation of the State
        headq - Headquarters of the State
        language - Official language of the State

      • getState

        public java.lang.String getState(java.lang.String shortName)
        This is called to retrieve a State's details from the database using it's Short-Notation
        Parameters:
        shortName - The Short-Notation of the desired State
        Returns:
        details if the State exists in the records, else "Data Not Found"
